name: Agua Fresca
description: Agua Fresca means “fresh water” in Spanish. This sweet and tart hibiscus refresher will cool you down on a hot summer day!
preparation:
1. In Multipurpose Pot – 12 Cup, combine mix with water. Steep 10 min or overnight.
  2. Strain into pitcher; discard solids. Pour over ice or refrigerate until chilled.
